name: Firefox Windows 10 Dark
description: Firefox style inspired on Microsoft Edge for Windows 10. Dark theme for Firefox. #black
additional_info: Version 2.6 Changelog: 2.6 - Tabs scrollbox improved - Code cleaning - Minor modifications 2.5 - Bug fixes, text color and background color 2.4 - Bug fixes, scaling and text color 2.3 - Not selected tab text grayed 2.2 - Tab sound icon adapted - Removed pinned tab glow 2.1 - Minor visual adjustments 2.0 - Complete redesign - Major changes 1.3 - Fixed pinned tabs not displaying correctly when multiple tabs were opened 1.2 - Based on https://userstyles.org/styles/123821/firefox-windows-10

discussions.name: Broken on latest version of firefox
To be more presise: minimize, maximize and close buttons are missing on latest version of firefox.
